topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553ea54d6368727230730400#post_553ea54d6368727230730400
Well with Lightsworn decks you wanna end the duel as quickly as possible. And because you're constantly getting rid of cards getting to your trump card is easy. Although if a duel went on for more than ten turns you were basically fucked. But by the time you git Lightsworn Dragon on the field you had between five to ten monsters in the graveyard, all with "Lightsworn" in their name. That meant Lightsworn Dragon would get a MASSIVE power boost on top of his still impressive 2000 atk points.
